snippet.title: Extra Coin - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Extra Coin will be released on October 8th on Steam and Nintendo Switch!

Dive into The Arcade, a seemingly perfect virtual world housing most of humanity, and follow Mika as she unravels the mystery behind her parents’ disappearance.

Extra Coin is a story-rich life sim set between the real world and a virtual utopia: explore the city, do activities, and face your opponents. Would you rather respect the Loop or break it to find your lost parents?

Wishlist now: https://bit.ly/3AYt1rd

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/cinicgames

Follow CINIC Games:
https://twitter.com/CINICGames
https://www.tiktok.com/@cinicgames
https://www.instagram.com/cinicgames/
https://www.facebook.com/cinicgames
